messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5698043/diff/1/doc/devel/weekly.html File doc/devel/weekly.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5698043/diff/1/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode17 doc/devel/weekly.html:17:

2012-02-22

might want to say we hope that this weekly should includes the last significant incompatible changes before go1 rolls out? hope springs eternal in the human parahippocampal gyrus.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5698043/diff/1/doc/devel/weekly.html
File doc/devel/weekly.html (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5698043/diff/1/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode32
doc/devel/weekly.html:32: The Process.Wait method has dropped its option argument and the associated
also Waitmsg rewritten to ProcessState

http://codereview.appspot.com/5698043/diff/1/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode73
doc/devel/weekly.html:73: new, less strict bool rules.
this is a cmd/dist thing?

http://codereview.appspot.com/5698043/diff/1/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode103
doc/devel/weekly.html:103: fix race in sendfile test,
delete?

http://codereview.appspot.com/5698043/diff/1/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode104
doc/devel/weekly.html:104: update test to use time.Duration better.
delete?

http://codereview.appspot.com/5698043/diff/1/doc/devel/weekly.html File doc/devel/weekly.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5698043/diff/1/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode17 doc/devel/weekly.html:17:

2012-02-22

On 2012/02/23 05:23:47, r wrote: > might want to say we hope that this weekly should includes the last significant > incompatible changes before go1 rolls out? hope springs eternal in the human > parahippocampal gyrus. Done. http://codereview.appspot.com/5698043/diff/1/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode32 doc/devel/weekly.html:32: The Process.Wait method has dropped its option argument and the associated On 2012/02/23 05:30:26, bradfitzgoog wrote: > also Waitmsg rewritten to ProcessState Done. http://codereview.appspot.com/5698043/diff/1/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode73 doc/devel/weekly.html:73: new, less strict bool rules. On 2012/02/23 05:30:26, bradfitzgoog wrote: > this is a cmd/dist thing? No, it's a cmd/gc thing. http://codereview.appspot.com/5698043/diff/1/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode103 doc/devel/weekly.html:103: fix race in sendfile test, On 2012/02/23 05:30:26, bradfitzgoog wrote: > delete? Done. http://codereview.appspot.com/5698043/diff/1/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode104 doc/devel/weekly.html:104: update test to use time.Duration better. On 2012/02/23 05:30:26, bradfitzgoog wrote: > delete? Done.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=96bd78e7d35e ***
